text:
@realDonaldTrump IMAGINE getting more offended over a statue of a racist asshole being torn down than the 120,000+ americans that’ve died due to the coronavirus.

andrew jackson owned slaves & forced 60K native americans to leave their ancestral homeland. 4K of them died. chill, donald. 🥰
